overview: The electrician Peter Drews is a brigadier at a Baltic Sea dockyard. His men are among the most reliable and diligent workers at the dockyard. While four men follow Peter into the navy, Brigitte, who has broken up with Peter, takes over the control of the brigade. title: Hart am Wind
